> Are orange suits still immune to failing life support? I brought Jeb and Bob on a Minmus mission (with a hitchhiker but no supplies) and they both became tourists due to lack of supplies. Is this a bug or has it been changed?
> 

That's in your control on the difficulty settings. Just click the <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr> button when in the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> and check your settings.

Ok - for your orbital station, no idea why they are not coming back - that's odd.   You may have to rotate them back and see if they refresh once they are under 25km on Kerbin.  For the other - Expired EC is normal if the vessel is not in focus, I would not worry about it.

I'm getting a really bad bug on my kerbal save, where the life support window isn't showing anything. I've tried it on multiple crafts, and it's just not working. it keeps flashing like it's trying to refresh, but nothing's happening

Here's my log, I hope that it helps.**[https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UqHBWk1-nDEDZfMmqzCSo7_YjOgxy8yZ/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UqHBWk1-nDEDZfMmqzCSo7_YjOgxy8yZ/view?usp=sharing)**

You've got so many errors in that <u>heavily</u> moded 1.8.1 installation that I really don't know where to start.  You probably have mod and/or version conflicts, and the possible combinations are too numerous to count.

Ok, that's not entirely true.  Start by not playing on the Steam download.  Always download from Steam and then copy that KSP directory to somewhere new and mod and play that version.  You're allowed as many copies of the KSP folder as you like; people often have separate game directories for different KSP versions, mod combinations, planet packs, and mod development.  Also, this way, when Steam releases an update, it doesn't overwrite your game.

Have you installed or updated something recently after which you've seen this behaviour?  If so, undo it.

Do you really need to be running 1.8.1?  I can't tell because of the 160+ mods you're running.  At least I see that you're using <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)"><abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr></abbr>/LS 1.0.0.0.  According to the [<abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)"><abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr></abbr>/LS GitHub page](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/USI-LS/releases), you should probably be using v1.3.0.0.

I would generally recommend refreshing your KSP install but you might as well start over with 1.11.2.  Some mod author or player wiser than I might be able to offer some specific mismatch advice, but I wouldn't hold my breath.  The problem is probably not with <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)"><abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr></abbr>/LS itself but some mod conflict.

I also recommend using <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr></abbr> to help with compatible mod versions, if you aren't already.

I left a kerbal on the mun for like 30 days and just placed satellites around the mun for something else meanwhile. 

The kerbal became a tourist after i also tried to save him a few times xD 

But now i sendt a probe with a seat and food and enough EC but only his Hab is fixed and still a tourist ( standing 30 meters from it).

How do i rescue him from tourist to crew?  i tried googling it but there's not much to find about it
EVA?  In a craft?  need more details please

sorry if I'm unclear

[https://imgur.com/a/HZh5Bbv](https://imgur.com/a/HZh5Bbv) Val is in the targeted ship 134,5 meters from me (not EVA but stuck in the ship because of tourist mode)  

The probe you see have 1 seat, EC and 300 supplies and enough fuel to return to kerbin

when i get within the 150 meter range only "hab" goes yellow 22d but all others stay red and i can't EVA Val in the targeted ship because she is still tourist.

How do i get Val in the targeted ship 134,5 meters from me to be a crew again? I thought i had to bring supplies and a seat to fix that?

let me know if you need anything please

Do you have EC in the ship now as well?

If you have supplies, hab, and EC generation, try to go back to the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> scene, then back to your ship and force a reload.  If that still fails, send a ship with a claw and use crew transfer to get her home.

No EC because i disabled all use of EC before she became tourist and now I can't turn it back on because she's a tourist, so probably is it because Val's ship EC is disabled? (the probe doesn't have disabled EC) I also tried the reloading thing,  so a crew transfer is the last solution (so next time don't disable EC before becoming a tourist i guess?)
Yeah, if you have no EC then yep that will do it.
